description: Words that are censored or prohibited. Also refers to taboo subjects. Synonyms include 屏蔽词 (blocked words) and 违禁词 (prohibited words).

examples.translation: Emmm~ the check for sensitive words is so strict.

examples.chinese: 不知道碰到哪个敏感词了,发不出来
examples.translation: I don't know which sensitive word I hit, I can't post it.

examples.chinese: 发个讨论都直接ban,有什么敏感词吗
examples.translation: I got banned just for posting a discussion; were there any sensitive words?
